      33             : /*
      34             :  * NOTE:
      35             :  *   This file is gcc-parsable HW gospel, coming straight from HW engineers.
      36             :  *
      37             :  * It doesn't adhere to Linux kernel style and sometimes will do things in odd
      38             :  * ways. Unless there is something clearly wrong with it the code should
      39             :  * remain as-is as it provides us with a guarantee from HW that it is correct.
      40             :  */
      41             : 
      42             : #define BPP_INVALID 0
      43             : #define BPP_BLENDED_PIPE 0xffffffff
      44             : #define DCN31_MAX_DSC_IMAGE_WIDTH 5184
      45             : #define DCN31_MAX_FMT_420_BUFFER_WIDTH 4096
      46             : 
      47             : // For DML-C changes that hasn't been propagated to VBA yet
      48             : //#define __DML_VBA_ALLOW_DELTA__
      49             : 
      50             : // Move these to ip paramaters/constant
      51             : 
      52             : // At which vstartup the DML start to try if the mode can be supported
      53             : #define __DML_VBA_MIN_VSTARTUP__    9
      54             : 
      55             : // Delay in DCFCLK from ARB to DET (1st num is ARB to SDPIF, 2nd number is SDPIF to DET)
      56             : #define __DML_ARB_TO_RET_DELAY__    (7 + 95)
      57             : 
      58             : // fudge factor for min dcfclk calclation
      59             : #define __DML_MIN_DCFCLK_FACTOR__   1.15

     716           0 :         PixelClockAdjustmentForProgressiveToInterlaceUnit(mode_lib);

     723             : 
     724           0 : static unsigned int dscceComputeDelay(
     725             :                 unsigned int bpc,
     726             :                 double BPP,
     727             :                 unsigned int sliceWidth,
     728             :                 unsigned int numSlices,
     729             :                 enum output_format_class pixelFormat,
     730             :                 enum output_encoder_class Output)
     731             : {
     732             :         // valid bpc         = source bits per component in the set of {8, 10, 12}
     733             :         // valid bpp         = increments of 1/16 of a bit
     734             :         //                    min = 6/7/8 in N420/N422/444, respectively
     735             :         //                    max = such that compression is 1:1
     736             :         //valid sliceWidth  = number of pixels per slice line, must be less than or equal to 5184/numSlices (or 4096/numSlices in 420 mode)
     737             :         //valid numSlices   = number of slices in the horiziontal direction per DSC engine in the set of {1, 2, 3, 4}
     738             :         //valid pixelFormat = pixel/color format in the set of {:N444_RGB, :S422, :N422, :N420}
     739             : 
     740             :         // fixed value
     741           0 :         unsigned int rcModelSize = 8192;
     742             : 
     743             :         // N422/N420 operate at 2 pixels per clock
     744           0 :         unsigned int pixelsPerClock = 0, lstall, D, initalXmitDelay, w, s, ix, wx, P, l0, a, ax, L, Delay, pixels;
     745             : 
     746           0 :         if (pixelFormat == dm_420)
     747             :                 pixelsPerClock = 2;
     748           0 :         else if (pixelFormat == dm_444)
     749             :                 pixelsPerClock = 1;
     750           0 :         else if (pixelFormat == dm_n422)
     751             :                 pixelsPerClock = 2;
     752             :         // #all other modes operate at 1 pixel per clock
     753             :         else
     754           0 :                 pixelsPerClock = 1;
     755             : 
     756             :         //initial transmit delay as per PPS
     757           0 :         initalXmitDelay = dml_round(rcModelSize / 2.0 / BPP / pixelsPerClock);
     758             : 
     759             :         //compute ssm delay
     760           0 :         if (bpc == 8)
     761             :                 D = 81;
     762           0 :         else if (bpc == 10)
     763             :                 D = 89;
     764             :         else
     765           0 :                 D = 113;
     766             : 
     767             :         //divide by pixel per cycle to compute slice width as seen by DSC
     768           0 :         w = sliceWidth / pixelsPerClock;
     769             : 
     770             :         //422 mode has an additional cycle of delay
     771           0 :         if (pixelFormat == dm_420 || pixelFormat == dm_444 || pixelFormat == dm_n422)
     772             :                 s = 0;
     773             :         else
     774           0 :                 s = 1;
     775             : 
     776             :         //main calculation for the dscce
     777           0 :         ix = initalXmitDelay + 45;
     778           0 :         wx = (w + 2) / 3;
     779           0 :         P = 3 * wx - w;
     780           0 :         l0 = ix / w;
     781           0 :         a = ix + P * l0;
     782           0 :         ax = (a + 2) / 3 + D + 6 + 1;
     783           0 :         L = (ax + wx - 1) / wx;
     784           0 :         if ((ix % w) == 0 && P != 0)
     785             :                 lstall = 1;
     786             :         else
     787           0 :                 lstall = 0;
     788           0 :         Delay = L * wx * (numSlices - 1) + ax + s + lstall + 22;
     789             : 
     790             :         //dsc processes 3 pixel containers per cycle and a container can contain 1 or 2 pixels
     791           0 :         pixels = Delay * 3 * pixelsPerClock;
     792           0 :         return pixels;
     793             : }
     794             : 
     795             : static unsigned int dscComputeDelay(enum output_format_class pixelFormat, enum output_encoder_class Output)
     796             : {
     797           0 :         unsigned int Delay = 0;
     798             : 
     799           0 :         if (pixelFormat == dm_420) {
     800             :                 //   sfr
     801             :                 Delay = Delay + 2;
     802             :                 //   dsccif
     803             :                 Delay = Delay + 0;
     804             :                 //   dscc - input deserializer
     805             :                 Delay = Delay + 3;
     806             :                 //   dscc gets pixels every other cycle
     807             :                 Delay = Delay + 2;
     808             :                 //   dscc - input cdc fifo
     809             :                 Delay = Delay + 12;
     810             :                 //   dscc gets pixels every other cycle
     811             :                 Delay = Delay + 13;
     812             :                 //   dscc - cdc uncertainty
     813             :                 Delay = Delay + 2;
     814             :                 //   dscc - output cdc fifo
     815             :                 Delay = Delay + 7;
     816             :                 //   dscc gets pixels every other cycle
     817             :                 Delay = Delay + 3;
     818             :                 //   dscc - cdc uncertainty
     819             :                 Delay = Delay + 2;
     820             :                 //   dscc - output serializer
     821             :                 Delay = Delay + 1;
     822             :                 //   sft
     823             :                 Delay = Delay + 1;
     824           0 :         } else if (pixelFormat == dm_n422) {
     825             :                 //   sfr
     826             :                 Delay = Delay + 2;
     827             :                 //   dsccif
     828             :                 Delay = Delay + 1;
     829             :                 //   dscc - input deserializer
     830             :                 Delay = Delay + 5;
     831             :                 //  dscc - input cdc fifo
     832             :                 Delay = Delay + 25;
     833             :                 //   dscc - cdc uncertainty
     834             :                 Delay = Delay + 2;
     835             :                 //   dscc - output cdc fifo
     836             :                 Delay = Delay + 10;
     837             :                 //   dscc - cdc uncertainty
     838             :                 Delay = Delay + 2;
     839             :                 //   dscc - output serializer
     840             :                 Delay = Delay + 1;
     841             :                 //   sft
     842             :                 Delay = Delay + 1;
     843             :         } else {
     844             :                 //   sfr
     845           0 :                 Delay = Delay + 2;
     846             :                 //   dsccif
     847           0 :                 Delay = Delay + 0;
     848             :                 //   dscc - input deserializer
     849           0 :                 Delay = Delay + 3;
     850             :                 //   dscc - input cdc fifo
     851           0 :                 Delay = Delay + 12;
     852             :                 //   dscc - cdc uncertainty
     853           0 :                 Delay = Delay + 2;
     854             :                 //   dscc - output cdc fifo
     855           0 :                 Delay = Delay + 7;
     856             :                 //   dscc - output serializer
     857           0 :                 Delay = Delay + 1;
     858             :                 //   dscc - cdc uncertainty
     859           0 :                 Delay = Delay + 2;
     860             :                 //   sft
     861           0 :                 Delay = Delay + 1;
     862             :         }
     863             : 
     864             :         return Delay;
     865             : }
     866             : 
     867           0 : static bool CalculatePrefetchSchedule(

     968             : 
     969           0 :         if (GPUVMEnable == true && HostVMEnable == true) {
     970             :                 HostVMDynamicLevelsTrips = HostVMMaxNonCachedPageTableLevels;
     971             :         } else {
     972           0 :                 HostVMDynamicLevelsTrips = 0;
     973             :         }
     974             : #ifdef __DML_VBA_DEBUG__
     975             :         dml_print("DML::%s: GPUVMEnable=%d HostVMEnable=%d HostVMInefficiencyFactor=%f\n", __func__, GPUVMEnable, HostVMEnable, HostVMInefficiencyFactor);
     976             : #endif
     977           0 :         CalculateVupdateAndDynamicMetadataParameters(
     978             :                         MaxInterDCNTileRepeaters,
     979             :                         myPipe->DPPCLK,
     980             :                         myPipe->DISPCLK,
     981             :                         myPipe->DCFCLKDeepSleep,
     982             :                         myPipe->PixelClock,
     983           0 :                         myPipe->HTotal,
     984           0 :                         myPipe->VBlank,
     985             :                         DynamicMetadataTransmittedBytes,
     986             :                         DynamicMetadataLinesBeforeActiveRequired,
     987           0 :                         myPipe->InterlaceEnable,
     988           0 :                         myPipe->ProgressiveToInterlaceUnitInOPP,
     989             :                         TSetup,
     990             :                         &Tdmbf,
     991             :                         &Tdmec,
     992             :                         &Tdmsks,
     993             :                         VUpdateOffsetPix,
     994             :                         VUpdateWidthPix,
     995             :                         VReadyOffsetPix);
     996             : 
     997           0 :         LineTime = myPipe->HTotal / myPipe->PixelClock;
     998           0 :         trip_to_mem = UrgentLatency;
     999           0 :         Tvm_trips = UrgentExtraLatency + trip_to_mem * (GPUVMPageTableLevels * (HostVMDynamicLevelsTrips + 1) - 1);
    1000             : 
    1001             : #ifdef __DML_VBA_ALLOW_DELTA__
    1002             :         if (DynamicMetadataVMEnabled == true && GPUVMEnable == true) {
    1003             : #else
    1004           0 :         if (DynamicMetadataVMEnabled == true) {
    1005             : #endif
    1006           0 :                 *Tdmdl = TWait + Tvm_trips + trip_to_mem;
    1007             :         } else {
    1008           0 :                 *Tdmdl = TWait + UrgentExtraLatency;
    1009             :         }
    1010             : 
    1011             : #ifdef __DML_VBA_ALLOW_DELTA__
    1012             :         if (DynamicMetadataEnable == false) {
    1013             :                 *Tdmdl = 0.0;
    1014             :         }
    1015             : #endif
    1016             : 
    1017           0 :         if (DynamicMetadataEnable == true) {
    1018           0 :                 if (VStartup * LineTime < *TSetup + *Tdmdl + Tdmbf + Tdmec + Tdmsks) {
    1019           0 :                         *NotEnoughTimeForDynamicMetadata = true;
    1020             :                         dml_print("DML::%s: Not Enough Time for Dynamic Meta!\n", __func__);
    1021             :                         dml_print("DML::%s: Tdmbf: %fus - time for dmd transfer from dchub to dio output buffer\n", __func__, Tdmbf);
    1022             :                         dml_print("DML::%s: Tdmec: %fus - time dio takes to transfer dmd\n", __func__, Tdmec);
    1023             :                         dml_print("DML::%s: Tdmsks: %fus - time before active dmd must complete transmission at dio\n", __func__, Tdmsks);
    1024             :                         dml_print("DML::%s: Tdmdl: %fus - time for fabric to become ready and fetch dmd \n", __func__, *Tdmdl);
    1025             :                 } else {
    1026           0 :                         *NotEnoughTimeForDynamicMetadata = false;
    1027             :                 }
    1028             :         } else {
    1029           0 :                 *NotEnoughTimeForDynamicMetadata = false;
    1030             :         }
    1031             :

    1786           0 : static double CalculatePrefetchSourceLines(

    2049           0 : static void DISPCLKDPPCLKDCFCLKDeepSleepPrefetchParametersWatermarksAndPerformanceCalculation(struct display_mode_lib *mode_lib)
    2050             : {
    2051           0 :         struct vba_vars_st *v = &mode_lib->vba;
    2052             :         unsigned int j, k;
    2053           0 :         double HostVMInefficiencyFactor = 1.0;
    2054           0 :         bool NoChromaPlanes = true;
    2055             :         int ReorderBytes;
    2056             :         double VMDataOnlyReturnBW;
    2057           0 :         double MaxTotalRDBandwidth = 0;
    2058           0 :         int PrefetchMode = v->PrefetchModePerState[v->VoltageLevel][v->maxMpcComb];
    2059             : 
    2060           0 :         v->WritebackDISPCLK = 0.0;
    2061           0 :         v->DISPCLKWithRamping = 0;
    2062           0 :         v->DISPCLKWithoutRamping = 0;
    2063           0 :         v->GlobalDPPCLK = 0.0;
    2064             :         /* DAL custom code: need to update ReturnBW in case min dcfclk is overriden */
    2065             :         {
    2066           0 :         double IdealFabricAndSDPPortBandwidthPerState = dml_min(
    2067           0 :                         v->ReturnBusWidth * v->DCFCLKState[v->VoltageLevel][v->maxMpcComb],
    2068           0 :                         v->FabricClockPerState[v->VoltageLevel] * v->FabricDatapathToDCNDataReturn);
    2069           0 :         double IdealDRAMBandwidthPerState = v->DRAMSpeedPerState[v->VoltageLevel] * v->NumberOfChannels * v->DRAMChannelWidth;
    2070           0 :         if (v->HostVMEnable != true) {
    2071           0 :                 v->ReturnBW = dml_min(
    2072           0 :                                 IdealFabricAndSDPPortBandwidthPerState * v->PercentOfIdealFabricAndSDPPortBWReceivedAfterUrgLatency / 100.0,
    2073           0 :                                 IdealDRAMBandwidthPerState * v->PercentOfIdealDRAMBWReceivedAfterUrgLatencyPixelDataOnly / 100.0);
    2074             :         } else {
    2075           0 :                 v->ReturnBW = dml_min(
    2076           0 :                                 IdealFabricAndSDPPortBandwidthPerState * v->PercentOfIdealFabricAndSDPPortBWReceivedAfterUrgLatency / 100.0,
    2077           0 :                                 IdealDRAMBandwidthPerState * v->PercentOfIdealDRAMBWReceivedAfterUrgLatencyPixelMixedWithVMData / 100.0);
    2078             :         }
    2079             :         }
    2080             :         /* End DAL custom code */
    2081             : 
    2082             :         // DISPCLK and DPPCLK Calculation
    2083             :         //
    2084           0 :         for (k = 0; k < v->NumberOfActivePlanes; ++k) {
    2085           0 :                 if (v->WritebackEnable[k]) {
    2086           0 :                         v->WritebackDISPCLK = dml_max(
    2087             :                                         v->WritebackDISPCLK,
    2088             :                                         dml31_CalculateWriteBackDISPCLK(
    2089             :                                                         v->WritebackPixelFormat[k],
    2090             :                                                         v->PixelClock[k],
    2091             :                                                         v->WritebackHRatio[k],
    2092             :                                                         v->WritebackVRatio[k],
    2093             :                                                         v->WritebackHTaps[k],
    2094             :                                                         v->WritebackVTaps[k],
    2095           0 :                                                         v->WritebackSourceWidth[k],
    2096           0 :                                                         v->WritebackDestinationWidth[k],
    2097             :                                                         v->HTotal[k],
    2098           0 :                                                         v->WritebackLineBufferSize));
    2099             :                 }
    2100             :         }
    2101             : 
    2102           0 :         for (k = 0; k < v->NumberOfActivePlanes; ++k) {
    2103           0 :                 if (v->HRatio[k] > 1) {
    2104           0 :                         v->PSCL_THROUGHPUT_LUMA[k] = dml_min(

    3462           0 : static double CalculateTWait(unsigned int PrefetchMode, double DRAMClockChangeLatency, double UrgentLatency, double SREnterPlusExitTime)
    3463             : {
    3464           0 :         if (PrefetchMode == 0) {
    3465           0 :                 return dml_max(DRAMClockChangeLatency + UrgentLatency, dml_max(SREnterPlusExitTime, UrgentLatency));
    3466           0 :         } else if (PrefetchMode == 1) {
    3467           0 :                 return dml_max(SREnterPlusExitTime, UrgentLatency);
    3468             :         } else {
    3469             :                 return UrgentLatency;
    3470             :         }
    3471             : }
    3472             : 
    3473           0 : double dml31_CalculateWriteBackDISPCLK(
    3474             :                 enum source_format_class WritebackPixelFormat,
    3475             :                 double PixelClock,
    3476             :                 double WritebackHRatio,
    3477             :                 double WritebackVRatio,
    3478             :                 unsigned int WritebackHTaps,
    3479             :                 unsigned int WritebackVTaps,
    3480             :                 long WritebackSourceWidth,
    3481             :                 long WritebackDestinationWidth,
    3482             :                 unsigned int HTotal,
    3483             :                 unsigned int WritebackLineBufferSize)
    3484             : {
    3485             :         double DISPCLK_H, DISPCLK_V, DISPCLK_HB;
    3486             : 
    3487           0 :         DISPCLK_H = PixelClock * dml_ceil(WritebackHTaps / 8.0, 1) / WritebackHRatio;
    3488           0 :         DISPCLK_V = PixelClock * (WritebackVTaps * dml_ceil(WritebackDestinationWidth / 6.0, 1) + 8.0) / HTotal;
    3489           0 :         DISPCLK_HB = PixelClock * WritebackVTaps * (WritebackDestinationWidth * WritebackVTaps - WritebackLineBufferSize / 57.0) / 6.0 / WritebackSourceWidth;
    3490           0 :         return dml_max3(DISPCLK_H, DISPCLK_V, DISPCLK_HB);
    3491             : }
    3492             : 
    3493           0 : static double CalculateWriteBackDelay(
    3494             :                 enum source_format_class WritebackPixelFormat,
    3495             :                 double WritebackHRatio,
    3496             :                 double WritebackVRatio,
    3497             :                 unsigned int WritebackVTaps,
    3498             :                 int WritebackDestinationWidth,
    3499             :                 int WritebackDestinationHeight,
    3500             :                 int WritebackSourceHeight,
    3501             :                 unsigned int HTotal)
    3502             : {
    3503             :         double CalculateWriteBackDelay;
    3504             :         double Line_length;
    3505             :         double Output_lines_last_notclamped;
    3506             :         double WritebackVInit;
    3507             : 
    3508           0 :         WritebackVInit = (WritebackVRatio + WritebackVTaps + 1) / 2;
    3509           0 :         Line_length = dml_max((double) WritebackDestinationWidth, dml_ceil(WritebackDestinationWidth / 6.0, 1) * WritebackVTaps);
    3510           0 :         Output_lines_last_notclamped = WritebackDestinationHeight - 1 - dml_ceil((WritebackSourceHeight - WritebackVInit) / WritebackVRatio, 1);
    3511           0 :         if (Output_lines_last_notclamped < 0) {
    3512             :                 CalculateWriteBackDelay = 0;
    3513             :         } else {
    3514           0 :                 CalculateWriteBackDelay = Output_lines_last_notclamped * Line_length + (HTotal - WritebackDestinationWidth) + 80;
    3515             :         }
    3516           0 :         return CalculateWriteBackDelay;
    3517             : }
    3518             : 
    3519           0 : static void CalculateVupdateAndDynamicMetadataParameters(
    3520             :                 int MaxInterDCNTileRepeaters,
    3521             :                 double DPPCLK,
    3522             :                 double DISPCLK,
    3523             :                 double DCFClkDeepSleep,
    3524             :                 double PixelClock,
    3525             :                 int HTotal,
    3526             :                 int VBlank,
    3527             :                 int DynamicMetadataTransmittedBytes,
    3528             :                 int DynamicMetadataLinesBeforeActiveRequired,
    3529             :                 int InterlaceEnable,
    3530             :                 bool ProgressiveToInterlaceUnitInOPP,
    3531             :                 double *TSetup,
    3532             :                 double *Tdmbf,
    3533             :                 double *Tdmec,
    3534             :                 double *Tdmsks,
    3535             :                 int *VUpdateOffsetPix,
    3536             :                 double *VUpdateWidthPix,
    3537             :                 double *VReadyOffsetPix)
    3538             : {
    3539             :         double TotalRepeaterDelayTime;
    3540             : 
    3541           0 :         TotalRepeaterDelayTime = MaxInterDCNTileRepeaters * (2 / DPPCLK + 3 / DISPCLK);
    3542           0 :         *VUpdateWidthPix = dml_ceil((14.0 / DCFClkDeepSleep + 12.0 / DPPCLK + TotalRepeaterDelayTime) * PixelClock, 1.0);
    3543           0 :         *VReadyOffsetPix = dml_ceil(dml_max(150.0 / DPPCLK, TotalRepeaterDelayTime + 20.0 / DCFClkDeepSleep + 10.0 / DPPCLK) * PixelClock, 1.0);
    3544           0 :         *VUpdateOffsetPix = dml_ceil(HTotal / 4.0, 1);
    3545           0 :         *TSetup = (*VUpdateOffsetPix + *VUpdateWidthPix + *VReadyOffsetPix) / PixelClock;
    3546           0 :         *Tdmbf = DynamicMetadataTransmittedBytes / 4.0 / DISPCLK;
    3547           0 :         *Tdmec = HTotal / PixelClock;
    3548           0 :         if (DynamicMetadataLinesBeforeActiveRequired == 0) {
    3549           0 :                 *Tdmsks = VBlank * HTotal / PixelClock / 2.0;
    3550             :         } else {
    3551           0 :                 *Tdmsks = DynamicMetadataLinesBeforeActiveRequired * HTotal / PixelClock;
    3552             :         }
    3553           0 :         if (InterlaceEnable == 1 && ProgressiveToInterlaceUnitInOPP == false) {
    3554           0 :                 *Tdmsks = *Tdmsks / 2;
    3555             :         }
    3556             : #ifdef __DML_VBA_DEBUG__
    3557             :         dml_print("DML::%s: VUpdateWidthPix = %d\n", __func__, *VUpdateWidthPix);
    3558             :         dml_print("DML::%s: VReadyOffsetPix = %d\n", __func__, *VReadyOffsetPix);
    3559             :         dml_print("DML::%s: VUpdateOffsetPix = %d\n", __func__, *VUpdateOffsetPix);
    3560             : #endif
    3561           0 : }
    3562             : 
    3563           0 : static void CalculateRowBandwidth(
    3564             :                 bool GPUVMEnable,
    3565             :                 enum source_format_class SourcePixelFormat,
    3566             :                 double VRatio,
    3567             :                 double VRatioChroma,
    3568             :                 bool DCCEnable,
    3569             :                 double LineTime,
    3570             :                 unsigned int MetaRowByteLuma,
    3571             :                 unsigned int MetaRowByteChroma,
    3572             :                 unsigned int meta_row_height_luma,
    3573             :                 unsigned int meta_row_height_chroma,
    3574             :                 unsigned int PixelPTEBytesPerRowLuma,
    3575             :                 unsigned int PixelPTEBytesPerRowChroma,
    3576             :                 unsigned int dpte_row_height_luma,
    3577             :                 unsigned int dpte_row_height_chroma,
    3578             :                 double *meta_row_bw,
    3579             :                 double *dpte_row_bw)
    3580             : {
    3581           0 :         if (DCCEnable != true) {
    3582           0 :                 *meta_row_bw = 0;
    3583           0 :         } else if (SourcePixelFormat == dm_420_8 || SourcePixelFormat == dm_420_10 || SourcePixelFormat == dm_420_12 || SourcePixelFormat == dm_rgbe_alpha) {
    3584           0 :                 *meta_row_bw = VRatio * MetaRowByteLuma / (meta_row_height_luma * LineTime) + VRatioChroma * MetaRowByteChroma / (meta_row_height_chroma * LineTime);
    3585             :         } else {
    3586           0 :                 *meta_row_bw = VRatio * MetaRowByteLuma / (meta_row_height_luma * LineTime);
    3587             :         }
    3588             : 
    3589           0 :         if (GPUVMEnable != true) {
    3590           0 :                 *dpte_row_bw = 0;
    3591           0 :         } else if (SourcePixelFormat == dm_420_8 || SourcePixelFormat == dm_420_10 || SourcePixelFormat == dm_420_12 || SourcePixelFormat == dm_rgbe_alpha) {
    3592           0 :                 *dpte_row_bw = VRatio * PixelPTEBytesPerRowLuma / (dpte_row_height_luma * LineTime)
    3593           0 :                                 + VRatioChroma * PixelPTEBytesPerRowChroma / (dpte_row_height_chroma * LineTime);

    3599           0 : static void CalculateFlipSchedule(
    3600             :                 struct display_mode_lib *mode_lib,
    3601             :                 double HostVMInefficiencyFactor,
    3602             :                 double UrgentExtraLatency,
    3603             :                 double UrgentLatency,

    3626             :                 double *final_flip_bw,
    3627             :                 bool *ImmediateFlipSupportedForPipe)

    3629           0 :         double min_row_time = 0.0;
    3630             :         unsigned int HostVMDynamicLevelsTrips;

    3633             :         double ImmediateFlipBW;
    3634             : 
    3635           0 :         if (GPUVMEnable == true && HostVMEnable == true) {
    3636             :                 HostVMDynamicLevelsTrips = HostVMMaxNonCachedPageTableLevels;
    3637             :         } else {
    3638           0 :                 HostVMDynamicLevelsTrips = 0;
    3639             :         }

    3641           0 :         if (GPUVMEnable == true || DCCEnable == true) {
    3642           0 :                 ImmediateFlipBW = (PDEAndMetaPTEBytesPerFrame + MetaRowBytes + DPTEBytesPerRow) * BandwidthAvailableForImmediateFlip / TotImmediateFlipBytes;
    3643             :         }
    3644             : 
    3645           0 :         if (GPUVMEnable == true) {

    3649             :                                 LineTime / 4.0);

    3651             :                 TimeForFetchingMetaPTEImmediateFlip = 0;

    3656           0 :                 TimeForFetchingRowInVBlankImmediateFlip = dml_max3(

    3671           0 :                 *final_flip_bw = (MetaRowBytes + DPTEBytesPerRow * HostVMInefficiencyFactor) / (*DestinationLinesToRequestRowInImmediateFlip * LineTime);
    3672             :         } else {
    3673           0 :                 *final_flip_bw = 0;
    3674             :         }
    3675             : 
    3676           0 :         if (SourcePixelFormat == dm_420_8 || SourcePixelFormat == dm_420_10 || SourcePixelFormat == dm_rgbe_alpha) {
    3677           0 :                 if (GPUVMEnable == true && DCCEnable != true) {
    3678           0 :                         min_row_time = dml_min(dpte_row_height * LineTime / VRatio, dpte_row_height_chroma * LineTime / VRatioChroma);

    3680           0 :                         min_row_time = dml_min(meta_row_height * LineTime / VRatio, meta_row_height_chroma * LineTime / VRatioChroma);

    3716           0 : static double TruncToValidBPP(

    3908           0 : void dml31_ModeSupportAndSystemConfigurationFull(struct display_mode_lib *mode_lib)

    3910           0 :         struct vba_vars_st *v = &mode_lib->vba;
    3911             :

    3940           0 :                                                 || v->VRatio[k] != 1.0 || v->vtaps[k] != 1.0)) {
    3941           0 :                         v->ScaleRatioAndTapsSupport = false;
    3942           0 :                 } else if (v->vtaps[k] < 1.0 || v->vtaps[k] > 8.0 || v->htaps[k] < 1.0 || v->htaps[k] > 8.0

    3956             :                 }
    3957             :         }
    3958             :         /*Source Format, Pixel Format and Scan Support Check*/
    3959             : 
    3960           0 :         v->SourceFormatPixelAndScanSupport = true;
    3961           0 :         for (k = 0; k < v->NumberOfActivePlanes; k++) {

    3965           0 :                         v->SourceFormatPixelAndScanSupport = false;

    3967             :         }
    3968             :         /*Bandwidth Support Check*/

    3970           0 :         for (k = 0; k < v->NumberOfActivePlanes; k++) {

    5646           0 :         *UrgentWatermark = UrgentLatency + ExtraLatency;

    5713             :                 } else {
    5714             :                         LinesInDETC = 0;
    5715             :                         FullDETBufferingTimeC = 999999;
    5716             :                 }
    5717             :

    5737             :                 }
    5738             :

    5744             :                         }
    5745           0 :                         WritebackDRAMClockChangeLatencyMargin = WritebackDRAMClockChangeLatencyHiding - v->WritebackDRAMClockChangeWatermark;
    5746           0 :                         v->ActiveDRAMClockChangeLatencyMargin[k] = dml_min(v->ActiveDRAMClockChangeLatencyMargin[k], WritebackDRAMClockChangeLatencyMargin);
    5747             :                 }
    5748             :         }
    5749             :

    5763             :                         }
    5764             :                 }

    5872           0 : static void CalculateUrgentBurstFactor(
    5873             :                 int swath_width_luma_ub,
    5874             :                 int swath_width_chroma_ub,
    5875             :                 unsigned int SwathHeightY,
    5876             :                 unsigned int SwathHeightC,
    5877             :                 double LineTime,
    5878             :                 double UrgentLatency,
    5879             :                 double CursorBufferSize,
    5880             :                 unsigned int CursorWidth,
    5881             :                 unsigned int CursorBPP,

    5908           0 :                                 *UrgentBurstFactorCursor = 0;

    5910           0 :                                 *UrgentBurstFactorCursor = CursorBufferSizeInTime / (CursorBufferSizeInTime - UrgentLatency);
    5911             :                         }
    5912             :                 } else {
    5913           0 :                         *UrgentBurstFactorCursor = 1;
    5914             :                 }
    5915             :         }
    5916             :

    5924           0 :                         *UrgentBurstFactorLuma = DETBufferSizeInTimeLuma / (DETBufferSizeInTimeLuma - UrgentLatency);
    5925             :                 }
    5926             :         } else {
    5927           0 :                 *UrgentBurstFactorLuma = 1;
    5928             :         }

    5931           0 :                 LinesInDETChroma = DETBufferSizeC / BytePerPixelInDETC / swath_width_chroma_ub;

    6445             : 
    6446           0 :         for (k = 0; k < NumberOfActivePlanes; ++k) {
    6447           0 :                 if (DCCEnable[k] == true) {
    6448           0 :                         if ((SourceScan[k] == dm_vert && BlockWidth256BytesY[k] > SwathHeightY[k]) || (SourceScan[k] != dm_vert && BlockHeight256BytesY[k] > SwathHeightY[k])

    6451             :                         } else {
    6452           0 :                                 MaximumEffectiveCompressionLuma = 4;
    6453             :                         }

    6456           0 :                         TotalZeroSizeCompressedReadBandwidth = TotalZeroSizeCompressedReadBandwidth
    6457           0 :                                         + ReadBandwidthPlaneLuma[k] * DCCFractionOfZeroSizeRequestsLuma[k] / MaximumEffectiveCompressionLuma;
    6458           0 :                         if (ReadBandwidthPlaneChroma[k] > 0) {
    6459           0 :                                 if ((SourceScan[k] == dm_vert && BlockWidth256BytesC[k] > SwathHeightC[k])

    6461             :                                         MaximumEffectiveCompressionChroma = 2;
    6462             :                                 } else {
    6463           0 :                                         MaximumEffectiveCompressionChroma = 4;
    6464             :                                 }
    6465           0 :                                 TotalCompressedReadBandwidth = TotalCompressedReadBandwidth
    6466           0 :                                                 + ReadBandwidthPlaneChroma[k] / dml_min(NetDCCRateChroma[k], MaximumEffectiveCompressionChroma);

    7019           0 : static double CalculateExtraLatencyBytes(
    7020             :                 int ReorderingBytes,
    7021             :                 int TotalNumberOfActiveDPP,
    7022             :                 int PixelChunkSizeInKByte,
    7023             :                 int TotalNumberOfDCCActiveDPP,

    7077           0 : static void UseMinimumDCFCLK(
    7078             :                 struct display_mode_lib *mode_lib,
    7079             :                 int MaxPrefetchMode,
    7080             :                 int ReorderingBytes)
    7081             : {
    7082           0 :         struct vba_vars_st *v = &mode_lib->vba;
    7083             :         int dummy1, i, j, k;
    7084             :         double NormalEfficiency,  dummy2, dummy3;
    7085             :         double TotalMaxPrefetchFlipDPTERowBandwidth[DC__VOLTAGE_STATES][2];
    7086             : 
    7087           0 :         NormalEfficiency = v->PercentOfIdealFabricAndSDPPortBWReceivedAfterUrgLatency / 100.0;
    7088           0 :         for (i = 0; i < v->soc.num_states; ++i) {
    7089           0 :                 for (j = 0; j <= 1; ++j) {
    7090             :                         double PixelDCFCLKCyclesRequiredInPrefetch[DC__NUM_DPP__MAX];
    7091             :                         double PrefetchPixelLinesTime[DC__NUM_DPP__MAX];
    7092             :                         double DCFCLKRequiredForPeakBandwidthPerPlane[DC__NUM_DPP__MAX];
    7093             :                         double DynamicMetadataVMExtraLatency[DC__NUM_DPP__MAX];
    7094             :                         double MinimumTWait;
    7095             :                         double NonDPTEBandwidth;
    7096             :                         double DPTEBandwidth;
    7097             :                         double DCFCLKRequiredForAverageBandwidth;
    7098             :                         double ExtraLatencyBytes;
    7099             :                         double ExtraLatencyCycles;
    7100             :                         double DCFCLKRequiredForPeakBandwidth;
    7101             :                         int NoOfDPPState[DC__NUM_DPP__MAX];
    7102             :                         double MinimumTvmPlus2Tr0;
    7103             : 
    7104           0 :                         TotalMaxPrefetchFlipDPTERowBandwidth[i][j] = 0;
    7105           0 :                         for (k = 0; k < v->NumberOfActivePlanes; ++k) {
    7106           0 :                                 TotalMaxPrefetchFlipDPTERowBandwidth[i][j] = TotalMaxPrefetchFlipDPTERowBandwidth[i][j]
    7107           0 :                                                 + v->NoOfDPP[i][j][k] * v->DPTEBytesPerRow[i][j][k] / (15.75 * v->HTotal[k] / v->PixelClock[k]);
    7108             :                         }
    7109             : 
    7110           0 :                         for (k = 0; k <= v->NumberOfActivePlanes - 1; ++k) {
    7111           0 :                                 NoOfDPPState[k] = v->NoOfDPP[i][j][k];
    7112             :                         }
    7113             : 
    7114           0 :                         MinimumTWait = CalculateTWait(MaxPrefetchMode, v->FinalDRAMClockChangeLatency, v->UrgLatency[i], v->SREnterPlusExitTime);
    7115           0 :                         NonDPTEBandwidth = v->TotalVActivePixelBandwidth[i][j] + v->TotalVActiveCursorBandwidth[i][j] + v->TotalMetaRowBandwidth[i][j];
    7116           0 :                         DPTEBandwidth = (v->HostVMEnable == true || v->ImmediateFlipRequirement[0] == dm_immediate_flip_required) ?
    7117           0 :                                         TotalMaxPrefetchFlipDPTERowBandwidth[i][j] : v->TotalDPTERowBandwidth[i][j];
    7118           0 :                         DCFCLKRequiredForAverageBandwidth = dml_max3(
    7119             :                                         v->ProjectedDCFCLKDeepSleep[i][j],
    7120           0 :                                         (NonDPTEBandwidth + v->TotalDPTERowBandwidth[i][j]) / v->ReturnBusWidth
    7121           0 :                                                         / (v->MaxAveragePercentOfIdealFabricAndSDPPortBWDisplayCanUseInNormalSystemOperation / 100),
    7122           0 :                                         (NonDPTEBandwidth + DPTEBandwidth / NormalEfficiency) / NormalEfficiency / v->ReturnBusWidth);
    7123             : 
    7124           0 :                         ExtraLatencyBytes = CalculateExtraLatencyBytes(
    7125             :                                         ReorderingBytes,
    7126           0 :                                         v->TotalNumberOfActiveDPP[i][j],
    7127           0 :                                         v->PixelChunkSizeInKByte,
    7128           0 :                                         v->TotalNumberOfDCCActiveDPP[i][j],
    7129           0 :                                         v->MetaChunkSize,
    7130           0 :                                         v->GPUVMEnable,
    7131           0 :                                         v->HostVMEnable,
    7132           0 :                                         v->NumberOfActivePlanes,
    7133             :                                         NoOfDPPState,
    7134           0 :                                         v->dpte_group_bytes,
    7135             :                                         1,
    7136             :                                         v->HostVMMinPageSize,
    7137           0 :                                         v->HostVMMaxNonCachedPageTableLevels);
    7138           0 :                         ExtraLatencyCycles = v->RoundTripPingLatencyCycles + __DML_ARB_TO_RET_DELAY__ + ExtraLatencyBytes / NormalEfficiency / v->ReturnBusWidth;
    7139           0 :                         for (k = 0; k < v->NumberOfActivePlanes; ++k) {
    7140             :                                 double DCFCLKCyclesRequiredInPrefetch;
    7141             :                                 double ExpectedPrefetchBWAcceleration;
    7142             :                                 double PrefetchTime;
    7143             : 
    7144           0 :                                 PixelDCFCLKCyclesRequiredInPrefetch[k] = (v->PrefetchLinesY[i][j][k] * v->swath_width_luma_ub_all_states[i][j][k] * v->BytePerPixelY[k]
    7145           0 :                                                 + v->PrefetchLinesC[i][j][k] * v->swath_width_chroma_ub_all_states[i][j][k] * v->BytePerPixelC[k]) / NormalEfficiency / v->ReturnBusWidth;

    7238           0 : static void CalculateUnboundedRequestAndCompressedBufferSize(

    7255           0 :                                         ConfigReturnBufferSizeInKByte - TotalActiveDPP * actDETBufferSizeInKByte :

    7270             : static bool UnboundedRequest(enum unbounded_requesting_policy UseUnboundedRequestingFinal, int TotalNumberOfActiveDPP, bool NoChroma, enum output_encoder_class Output)
